statements: UPDATE site_visits_and_meetings SET purpose='Discussion with stakeholders', client_name='ABC Corp', location='New York' WHERE visit_id=1;
UPDATE site_visits_and_meetings SET meeting_notes='Meeting went well', visit_date='2022-05-20', client_name='XYZ Inc' WHERE visit_id=2;
UPDATE site_visits_and_meetings SET purpose = 'Client Meeting', meeting_notes = 'Discussed project details' WHERE visit_id = 1;
UPDATE site_visits_and_meetings SET location = 'New York', visit_date = '2022-05-20' WHERE client_name = 'ABC Corp';
UPDATE site_visits SET duration_hrs = 2.5, notes = 'Completed task' WHERE visit_id = 101;
UPDATE client_meetings SET outcome = 'Positive feedback received', location = 'Conference Room A' WHERE meeting_id = 201;
UPDATE site_visits SET duration_hrs = 5.5, notes = 'Completed visit successfully' WHERE visit_id = 12345 AND client_id = 1001;
UPDATE client_meetings SET location = 'Virtual Meeting Room A', outcome = 'Agreed on project timeline' WHERE meeting_id = 54321 AND project_id = 2002;
UPDATE SiteVisits SET visit_description = 'Site visit for project X' WHERE visit_id = 1;
UPDATE Projects SET project_description = 'New project description' WHERE project_id = 2;
UPDATE SiteVisits SET visit_description = 'Updated description' WHERE visit_id = 1;
UPDATE ClientMeetings SET meeting_notes = 'New meeting notes' WHERE project_id = 2;
UPDATE site_visits SET visit_description = 'Follow-up meeting with client' WHERE visit_id = 103
UPDATE client_meetings SET meeting_notes = 'Discussion on project updates' WHERE client_id = 205
UPDATE site_visits SET visit_date = '2022-05-15', visit_description = 'Site visit for new project' WHERE visit_id = 123
UPDATE project_development SET project_description = 'Updated project description', end_date = '2022-06-30' WHERE project_id = 456
UPDATE site_visits SET duration_minutes = 60 WHERE visit_id = 1;
UPDATE client_meetings SET meeting_notes = 'Discuss budget proposal' WHERE meeting_id = 3;
UPDATE site_visits SET duration_minutes = 120, visit_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE visit_id = 101
UPDATE client_meetings SET meeting_notes = 'Meeting went well, discussed project details' WHERE meeting_id = 201
